original_text: Son of man, Nebuchadrezzar king of Babylon caused his army to serve a great service against Tyrus: every head was made bald, and every shoulder was peeled: yet had he no wages, nor his army, for Tyrus, for the service that he had served against it:
korean_text: 인자야 바벨론의 느부갓네살 왕이 그의 군대로 두로를 치게 할 때에 크게 수고하여 모든 머리털이 무지러졌고 모든 어깨가 벗어졌으나 그와 군대가 그 수고한 대가를 두로에서 얻지 못하였느니라

sentences.original_text: Son of man, Nebuchadrezzar king of Babylon
caused his army to serve a great service against Tyrus:
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 군대로 하여금 두로를 치는 큰 일을 하게 하였으나

sentences.original_text: for Tyrus, for the service that he had served against it:
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 그가 두로를 치는 일을 했음이라
